text: Michel Dessureault (born 11 March 1957) is a Canadian fencer. He competed at the 1976, 1984 and 1988 Summer Olympics. He was inducted into the Ottawa Sport Hall of Fame. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Canada Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Fencers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Quebec
title: Michel Dessureault
